# Chris Misztur

> Chris Misztur is the President & Founder of Mr. IIoT, specializing in building Smart Factories, both real and virtual. With over 25 years of experience, he drives digital transformation in manufacturing by integrating business systems and applying innovative Industrial IoT (IIoT) solutions.

Based in the Greater Chicago Area, Chris brings 25+ years of experience in digital Industry 4.0 transformation, smart factory implementation, business system integration, and custom software/middleware development. He is the creator of the "5C" closed-loop feedback approach to IIoT and a patent holder in manufacturing technology.

## Pages

https://chrismisztur.com/: Home page with hero, services overview, and testimonials.
https://chrismisztur.com/about.html: About page featuring Chris's bio, professional timeline, and core values.
https://chrismisztur.com/services.html: Detailed descriptions of services offered, including Digital Industry 4.0, Business System Integration, Industrial Automation, SHARC IoT Adapter, DIME Software Suite, and AI/LLM Implementation.
https://chrismisztur.com/solutions.html: Industries and specific solutions served, such as Discrete Manufacturing, Metal Fabrication, Automotive Supply Chain, Food & Beverage, Packaging Operations, Industrial Equipment OEMs, Aerospace, and Defense.
https://chrismisztur.com/process.html: Explanation of the methodology and process for client engagement, including Discovery, Design, Deploy, and Deliver stages.
https://chrismisztur.com/contact.html: Contact information and options for booking a meeting.
https://chrismisztur.com/audit.html: Information about a free IIoT assessment and discovery call.
